DOC.brief_summary: Uveal Melanoma rare cancer approximately 3,000 case diagnose US every year . Nearly half experience spread cancer outside eye . The DecisionDx-UM gene expression test classify individual 's tumor low risk ( class 1 ) high risk ( class 2 ) spreading . This study do collect information physician use DecisionDx-UM result design individual treatment plan . It also track outcome uveal melanoma population receive DecisionDx-UM testing .
